{{Quote|Piss on Mance Rayder! And piss on the North! We're going as far south as south goes!|Stiv to [[Osha]]|A Golden Crown}}
'''Stiv''' is a minor character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is played by guest star [[Stephen Don]] and only appears in "[[A Golden Crown]]." Stiv is a [[Night's Watch]] deserter who is killed while fleeing south of the Wall.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Stiv is a member of a band of wildlings who manage to evade the Watch to seek succour in the lands to the south. He is an associate of Osha and Wallen.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Stiv is a former member of the [[Night's Watch]], who abandoned [[the Wall]] to live amongst the [[Free Folk]].

===[[Season 1]]===
Stiv, [[Osha]] and [[Wallen]] flee south of the Wall, apparently in fear of the return of the [[White Walkers]]. In the woods near [[Winterfell]] they stumble across [[Bran Stark]] and decide to steal his horse. Realizing his importance, they ponder taking him prisoner and returning him to [[Mance Rayder]], the [[King-Beyond-the-Wall]], for a reward, but decide against it. [[Robb Stark]] intervenes, and kills Wallen and disables Osha.Â Stiv holds a knife to Bran's throat, and despite Bran's protests not to, Robb lowers his sword as Stiv tells him to. However, [[Theon Greyjoy]] shoots him through the back with an arrow, killing him. Osha surrenders to [[House Stark|Stark]] custody.<ref>"[[A Golden Crown]]"</ref>
